Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-25177 affecting package luajit for versions less than 2.1.0-28
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-25177 affecting package luajit for versions less than 2.1.0-28. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package luajit is earlier than 2.1.0-28, affected by CVE-2024-25177
